AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: discovered undocumented aliens hidden in a tractor-trailer and conducted a stop of Zeba Williams' vehicle
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Government: prevailing party in the district court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court where the defendant's motion to suppress evidence was denied and where the case is being heard
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: co-defendant who accompanied Zeba Williams on a trip to Laredo and was present during the Border Patrol stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: defendant who asked Raymond McMillon to accompany him on a trip to Laredo and was driving the tractor-trailer during the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Border Patrol Agent who initiated the stop of Zeba Williams' vehicle, questioned the defendants about their travel plans, and discovered hidden undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: Border Patrol Agent who participated in the stop with his canine, Aroxa, and alerted to potential contraband in the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena and Manuel Hernandez: agents involved in the arrest of Zeba Williams and Raymond McMillon, and the discovery of undocumented aliens hidden in the tractor-trailer
